programme.title: Jamie's Super Food S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Jamie's Super Food is an exciting series where you can learn how to eat your way to a healthier life. Each week Jamie cooks up a day's worth of delicious meals - perfectly balanced plates of mouthwatering food that have all the good nutrition you need in a day.

programme.title: Survivor 39 - EP 5
programme.desc: Two Survivor legends mentor the newest crop of Survivor players and teach the castaways everything they know about the game on the mysterious Island of the Idols. Players of the present learn from players of the past in the hope of guaranteeing a better future for themselves.

programme.title: Blue Planet S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough returns to the ocean waters, showing an array of weird and wonderful creatures, some of which have never been filmed before.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S4 - EP 12
programme.desc: Junior Bake Off is back for a fourth series, hosted by comedy duo Sam Nixon and Mark Rhodes. Top international chef Allegra McEvedy is joined by The Great British Bake Off winner Nadiya Hussain to judge 40 of Britain's best young bakers.

programme.title: Pound Puppies 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: The mission of a team of fearless dogs is to find homes for puppies in need. Their motto is A pup for every person and a person for every pup.

programme.title: Bat Pat - EP 0001 & 0002
programme.desc: Bat Pat and his human friends seek to unravel the mysteries of the scary creatures that lurk about in Fogville, always discovering that the supernatural characters aren't evil just loveable and misunderstood! Based on the best-selling book franchise.

programme.title: Horrid Henry 3 - EP 0043 & 0044
programme.desc: Adapted from the international best selling books, Horrid Henry is the iconic anti-hero who does the most fabulously naughty things most children only dream of.

programme.title: Future Card Buddyfight Ace - EP 35
programme.desc: The anime's story takes place 23 years after the events of Future Card Buddyfight X and centres on Yuga Mikado, son of Gao Mikado. Because Yuga is talented at games, he is known as the "Ace of Games." However, Buddyfight is Yuga's first card game. Yuga's buddy is Gargantua Dragon, a.k.a. Garga.

programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Why do some animals have big ears and others have tiny ones? Clue: it's not to match their body size or shape. Why do you hug yourself when you're cold? Why does the tiny mouse eat more than the large elephant? Make It Count goes into the wild to show you how Maths can give you the answers to all of these.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 618
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 18
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Tricked (Canada) - EP 17
programme.desc: Tricked Canada is a high-energy family series that pulls the rabbit out of the hat and flips it on its ear. It drags magic off the stage and onto the streets as master magician Eric LeClerc goes undercover with hidden cameras, posing in a variety of guises such as store clerk, waiter or sales assistant to pull super sneaky pranks on unsuspecting people.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting tough guy trying to find the last Twinkie, and a pair of sisters trying to get to an amusement park join forces to travel across a zombie-filled America.

programme.title: The Simpsons 30 - EP 4
programme.desc: Homer wins an oyster-eating contest against the mythical Cthulhu, Springfield is overrun by plant body-snatchers, Lisa finally snaps and Mr Burns opens a retirement home with some Jurassic upgrades.

programme.title: One Last Dance
programme.desc: When a New York dance company's brilliant artistic director dies, three former stars of the company are brought back in hopes of saving the company by resurrecting a dance piece that was created for them years ago, but never performed - the very dance that ended all their careers in a heartbreaking way. Given one last chance to discover a dream they lost, the three dancers battle against time and damaged relationships,.

programme.title: Grimm 6 - EP 12
programme.desc: The prophecy that was uncovered comes to pass when a dark force arrives in Portland with its eyes set on Diana. In an effort to protect her, Nick, along with Capt. Renard and Adalind, returns to the scene of his first investigation as a Grimm.

programme.title: Grimm 6 - EP 13
programme.desc: Nick faces off against his greatest foe yet as it seems no weapon can defeat Zerstorer. Elsewhere, Capt. Renard and Adalind try to keep Diana and baby Kelly safe as the threat has its eyes set on the children.

programme.title: The Rainbow Bus - EP 13
programme.desc: In today's episode of The Rainbow Bus, the adventurers chose to learn more about fruits! Mister D takes them to the Fruits Wholesale Centre. In the second activity, the learn how to make jam at the Jam making workshop! Their last visit takes them to the Fruit Farm.

programme.title: Kody Kapow - EP 26
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 30
programme.desc: Continuing adventures of Arashi in his quest to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner.

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 20
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 18
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S4 - EP 1
programme.desc: The Turtles face Shredder's new deadly assassin and uncover a new Kraang plot. They'll also encounter more mutants, discover more about the mysterious Kraang species, and venture into new realms.

programme.title: Me, Myself & Isaac! - EP 3
programme.desc: Isaac is sick and both Sporty and Smarty are left to pick up the pieces. But one thing leads to another and they are both sent to the wrong "camps". Sporty finds himself taking an important test at tuition while Smarty is trapped in a jungle survival exercise with his crazy instructor Sgt Hady. At home, Cik Kamisah gets the hint that there's more than one Isaac around...

Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)二十年后，圆慧的胞弟紫薇真人高居当朝国师。开心小和尚从少林寺调到乌龙寺做主持，使该寺戒律院主管铁空又气又爱，更是搞得县衙门老爷、师爷头痛不已。街头混混百搭阴差阳错成了开心的铁桶师叔，麻烦接踵而来。.

programme.title: 荷兰村 Holland V - EP 0081 & 0082

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 4

programme.desc: Growing families often want to upgrade to a bigger flat for that extra space but upgrading also comes with its own set of concerns. What keeps him going and what is his story behind? 32岁的梁照远是本地一位大胃王，他凭着过人的食量在网上吸引上万的粉丝追随，每次挑战至少能吃下4公斤的食物。身材瘦削的照远原本是一名健身教练，发现了自己能吃的天赋后毅然改行当职业大胃王。挑战时暴饮狂吃，日后会有什么后遗症？了解用“胃”经营事业需要付出的代价，他为何依然坚决？.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 40
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan slaps Haixiu when Haixiu admits that she has fallen for Yuzhen. Yuzhen witnesses the incident and reprimands Yiyuan for being unreasonable. However, Yiyuan does not think she is at fault. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海秀到餐厅报到，被艺苑质问是否喜欢宇真。海秀承认喜欢宇真，被艺苑打了一巴掌。宇真目睹海秀被掌掴，指责艺苑霸道，但艺苑却觉得自己一点错都没有。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Haila bumps into Sharon and is shocked to realise that she has lost her memory. Xiuhao urges Haila to tie the knot as soon as possible. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海拉把雪伦缝制的红外套还给雪伦的助理时，她碰见失去记忆的雪伦，大感震惊。秀浩向海拉提议尽快完成婚礼。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Sharon regains her memory upon seeing Xiuhao and Haila's wedding photo. Xiuhao's car is tampered and causes a serious accident but he survived unhurt. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雪伦在看到秀浩与海拉的婚照后恢复记忆。秀浩的车被人动手脚，遭导致他发生严重车祸，交通意外，但秀浩却毫发无伤。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. 《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 3
programme.desc: Ailin starts work as a secretary in Rongtai's company, J International. She asks her neighbour to help to find a babysitter for her twins. Jin Ben finds out that the killer K had taken Ailin's twins, so he volunteers to babysit the twins to investigate why K killed Ailin's husband... (PG)(双声道-中/韩)爱麟到容泰的J国际公司担任秘书，请邻居好友帮忙找保姆照顾双胞胎儿女。金本发现杀手K曾带走了爱麟的双胞胎，于是他毛遂自荐，愿意做双胞胎的保姆，暗中调查K杀死爱麟丈夫的死因。。。。。。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 4
programme.desc: NIS agent Zhiyan sneaks into Wen Chengzhu's house to spy and bumps into Jin Ben. She wants to know the contact address of Jin Ben, who is her ex-colleague. Jin Ben refuses to reveal so she tails him. Jin Ben discovers an eavesdropping device in a sticker at home which he destroys immediately. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)国家情报院的特工智妍秘密去文成洙家里探查时，与金本撞了个正着。她想知道旧同事金本的联系方式和住址，但金本并没有告诉她。她唯有偷偷跟踪金本。金本察觉到家里的小贴纸里面有窃听设备，立刻毁掉贴纸。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Guiwan schemes to frame Zhenyu again to deter him from applying for the retrial. Zhenyu is wanted by the police as a murder suspect; at the same time, his application for the retrial of Zaihe's case has been rejected... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)圭万为了擒住振宇，再一次策划阴谋要陷害他以阻止他申请复审。振宇因涉嫌杀人被警方通缉，同时他提出重审载赫案件的申请遭到驳回。。。。。。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Pop stars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Foodies have been known to comb the length and breadth of Singapore to hunt down that perfect bowl of noodles. There is just something so hearty about a bowl of noodles in premium broth or gravy. Episode Two tells the tales of three food families spinning oodles of yummy noodles for generations. (重).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) From local egg tarts, braised delicacies to mala hotpot, which dish will leave a lasting impression? In this episode, Host Michelle Chia explores flavoursome dishes captured in the novels of 3 renowned female Hong Kong authors. (重)道地的蛋挞，醇香的卤味、独特的甜点、麻辣的火锅，究竟哪一种滋味是香港作家笔墨间最让人回味的料理？这一集，主持人谢韵仪探索了三位女作家笔下的香港美食，通过味觉去体会作家笔墨间所表达的情感。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Childhood leukaemia or blood cancer takes at least 2-years to treat. Danny Yeo visits the only hospital in the capital city of Fujian province that provides specialized treatment and holistic care. For financially-strapped families, it's one of the last places to find hope towards complete healing. (重)中国大城市看病贵、看病难，但最好的癌症治疗集中此处。杨君伟陪白血病儿童家庭踏上求医之路，看举目无亲的他们如何在陌生城市安身治病。多亏社会力量，他们才能坚持漫长的抗癌斗争，等孩子痊愈，一起返乡。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 41
programme.desc: (R) Yuzhen accidentally hears the conversation between Yiyuan and her father and discovers that Yiyuan wants to remain in a relationship with him only because of a selfish business strategy. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真到病房察看艺苑的病情，无意间听到艺苑跟父亲说她跟宇真在一起是为了想利用宇真打造动人的爱情故事，巩固ONE’s食品亲民的形象。宇真很受伤。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 42
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan refuses to accept a break-up with Yuzhen. In a bid to get Yiyuan off his back, Yuzhen tells her that he has already started a relationship with Haixiu. Haixiu is happy even though she knows Yuzhen is not really in love with her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑一直不肯接受分手，宇真为了摆脱她，说已经喜欢上海秀。海秀一开始很错愕，后来虽然知道宇真只是把她当挡箭牌，却也很开心。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Sharon tells Haila that Xiuhao has become an immortal and she has to break up with him in order to break the curse. Meanwhile, Sharon starts to age after she killed Bai Xi. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雪伦告诉海拉秀浩已变永生不死，唯一解除魔咒的办法就是海拉离开秀浩。雪伦杀害白熙后便开始衰老。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 27
programme.desc: (R) Bai Xi left leaves behind a diary for Xiuhao and Haila after her death. Overnight, Sharon disappears into thin air overnight. Haila gradually turns old whereas Xiuhao remains youthful; both decide to settle down in the old castle in Slovenia. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)白熙死去，留下了一本日记给秀浩和海拉，雪伦则在一夜之间消失。海拉渐渐变老，而秀浩保持年轻；两人决定重返斯洛维尼亚。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 12
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. (最后一集)与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 5
programme.desc: Rongtai reprimands Ailin furiously when Ailin's kids soil the luxury bags. Without losing any time, he makes a call to place a new order. Ailin knows she is at fault and even thinks of mortgaging her house to repay the loss. Jin Ben asks Zhiyan for help to investigate Chen Rongtai and J International. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)当容泰看见名牌包被爱麟的孩子弄脏了，大发雷霆地将爱麟责骂了一番，并立刻打电话命人重新下订单。爱麟自知理亏，甚至想到用房产来抵押还债。金本拜托智妍帮忙调查陈容泰和他的J国际公司。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 6
programme.desc: Zhiyan tells Jin Ben that the profile of Chen Rongtai shows nothing suspicious. He is a rich man's son and his company specializes in the import of very high class, expensive bags from Italy. Meanwhile, neighbour Xianglie inadvertently spots Jin Ben and Zhiyan together. He mistakes Zhiyan as Jin Ben's girlfriend. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智妍告诉金本，陈容泰的简历没有什么破绽，是一个富二代，他经营的国际公司专门从意大利进口非常高档、价值不菲的皮包。这时，邻居相烈无意中看见金本和智妍见面的一幕，便以为智妍是金本的女朋友。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Renya is attacked and almost killed when she went looking for the murderer. Fortunately, Donghao arrives in time to save her. As a result, the killer's whereabouts is exposed and gets arrested. Zhenyu visits his father in prison and tells him joyfully that the application for the retrial has been approved. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仁雅去找凶手时，遭到杀手的袭击而险些遇害，幸好东浩及时赶到救了她。杀手因此暴露了行踪被捕入狱。振宇去监狱探望父亲载赫，十分高兴地告诉父亲为他重审冤案的申请已通过了。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Claypot rice is one of the classic street food in Hong Kong. It refers to rice with marinated meat or seafood, cooked in a claypot, drizzled with flavourful sauce and crisped rice on the bottom of pot. To make a good pot of rice, the selection of rice and control of fire are among the key qualities. (重)煲仔饭是香港街头美食的代表；它是由米饭混合肉类或海鲜，用砂煲焖煮而成。好的砂煲饭，除了选米本身，食材的选择和火候的控制，都蕴藏不少知识。上桌后的调味豉油以及饭锅巴，也是决定这煲饭好不好吃的关键因素。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Is it true that Singapore women are super calculative? The tricks they use at workplace and in love is totally different, and is it due to the greed in them? Besides that, close buddies are also one of their targets! The guests also revealed more gossips, thus it is an episode not to be missed! (重)新加坡女人超会算计，是真的还是假的？女人在职场和爱情里的算计伎俩有所不同，女人会算计是不是因为太贪婪所致？此外，女人的算计对象竟然还包括知心闺蜜！这一集的艺人嘉宾互相大爆八卦，错过了是你的损失哦！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 73
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai suspects that he is the real Jin Minxiu when he finds his childhood photo among Yinghao's belongings. Director Song passes away before he can tell Xiantai about his identity. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰在收拾英鎬的私人物品时发现英鎬竟然有他的儿时照片，怀疑自己是真正的金民秀。宋院长还没来得及告诉贤泰他的身世就过世了。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Guodou goes to Minhe's home, to take away Fengshun, invoking the labour law but Minhe insists Fengshun stay for a night. Guodou calls Mrs Du, hoping to get support from the family. But Mrs Du is very supportive when she learns that her daughter is staying at her boss's house. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)国斗跑到了敏赫家里，表示非要带走奉顺，还搬出了劳动法。敏赫非要把奉顺留下过夜，国斗甚至拿出了手机打电话给都妈妈，想要获得都奉顺家人的支持。一心想要将女儿嫁给敏赫的都妈妈在听见女儿要在老板家过夜后，却是大力支持。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 27
programme.desc: Yunxue learns from the doctor at the hospital that Xiaochun is alive, so she is determined to find her. Haizhu secretly transfers her WID shares to Wulie. Maya invites her friend, Xiaochun to stay in their house. Zhiyuan is unhappy to hear her friend is named Xiaochun, so she orders everyone to address her as Kelly instead. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪从医院的医生得知小春还活着，坚持要找回小春。为了让武烈在集团和家里有底气，海珠将自己在WID集团拥有的全部股份都转给金武烈。玛亚将英国朋友小春带回家住，智媛听到对方叫小春就很不开心，只让大家在家里叫她为英文名Kelly。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 28
programme.desc: Yunxue learns that a nurse, Jin Shunmei, took Xiaochun to England. Yunxue's father flies over to look for them. Meantime, Yunxue agrees to sell her mother's land to Daoying for WID shares. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪知道春儿被金顺带去英国，尹雪父亲决定替尹雪去英国搜集情报。尹雪以2%的WID股份将土地卖给道英,他认为这块土地会让WID集团获得新生。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 6
programme.desc: The old lady appears and Aidan questions her! The old lady tells him that Xiao Hong is the most precious thing to him and she is the price he has to pay for all his lies. Aidan is stunned. She also tells Aidan that the same person cannot be saved twice so there is no way Xiao Hong will live... (PG)Aidan责问老太婆，老太婆说出小红就是Aidan生命里最重要的人，小红就是Aidan 撒谎付的代价。Aidan震惊。老太婆也道出一个人不能撒谎救两次，小红是不可能活过来。Aidan悔不当初。。。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 26
programme.desc: Wukong meets Erget who worked alongside the former Tripitaka. Erget tells Wukong that the Heavenly Sword and a formidable demon will soon appear. Erget pleads with Wukong to end her life with the Heavenly Sword once he has eliminated the demon as she has lost the will to live without Tripitaka. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)悟空与白鹭见面，发现白鹭是上一世的三藏的守护者。白鹭告诉悟空天剑以及可以毁灭世界的厉鬼即将出现。白鹭恳请悟空在消灭厉鬼后用天剑结束她的生命，因为失去三藏的她已经没有活着的理由了。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The old lady appears and Aidan questions her! The old lady tells him that Xiao Hong is the most precious thing to him and she is the price he has to pay for all his lies. Aidan is stunned. She also tells Aidan that the same person cannot be saved twice so there is no way Xiao Hong will live... (PG)(重)Aidan责问老太婆，老太婆说出小红就是Aidan生命里最重要的人，小红就是Aidan 撒谎付的代价。Aidan震惊。老太婆也道出一个人不能撒谎救两次，小红是不可能活过来。Aidan悔不当初。。。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 27
programme.desc: (R) Yunxue learns from the doctor at the hospital that Xiaochun is alive, so she is determined to find her. Haizhu secretly transfers her WID shares to Wulie. Maya invites her friend, Xiaochun to stay in their house. Zhiyuan is unhappy to hear her friend is named Xiaochun, so she orders everyone to address her as Kelly instead. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪从医院的医生得知小春还活着，坚持要找回小春。为了让武烈在集团和家里有底气，海珠将自己在WID集团拥有的全部股份都转给金武烈。玛亚将英国朋友小春带回家住，智媛听到对方叫小春就很不开心，只让大家在家里叫她为英文名Kelly。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Yunxue learns that a nurse, Jin Shunmei, took Xiaochun to England. Yunxue's father flies over to look for them. Meantime, Yunxue agrees to sell her mother's land to Daoying for WID shares. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪知道春儿被金顺带去英国，尹雪父亲决定替尹雪去英国搜集情报。尹雪以2%的WID股份将土地卖给道英,他认为这块土地会让WID集团获得新生。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) This episode, host Quan Yi Feng visits two Singaporean students in Osaka and Kyoto to see how they overcame loneliness and alienation while adapting and integrating in a foreign land, how they learnt about the rules of survival in the Japanese society as well as finding space for self-development. (重)这一集节目中，主持人权怡凤前往大阪和京都探访两位本地留学生，并看看她们如何克服在异乡留学的适应和融入的过程中所产生的孤独感和隔阂感，并学会了外国人在日本社会生存的法则，在他乡找到了自我成长的空间。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 74
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai arranges for Qiangwei to lie to Zaiyong that Bafeng has made a copy of the memory card. Zaiyong attempts to pay for the duplicate and also reveals why he wanted Director Song dead. Xiantai overhears their conversation. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰安排蔷薇骗载永其实八峰复制了行车记录器的记忆卡。载永果真想用钱交换记忆卡，并透露当初为何要杀了宋院长。两人的对话被贤泰听得一清二楚。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Minhe is shot by ball bearing pellets at the park. The man behind the attack warns Minhe to give up the five-star company. If Minhe ignores his warning, the man threatened that a real gun will be used next. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)敏赫在公园遭到钢珠枪击， 幕后黑手来电要敏赫放弃继承五星集团， 要不然下一次就是真枪。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 29
programme.desc: Wulie gets anxious when Daoying decides to meet the business partner who is buying over their WID fashion as he is scheming to take over it secretly. He uses his shares given by Haizhu to borrow money from Monian to bribe them. Meanwhile, Yunxue and Daozi learn that Kelly is Xiaochun and also found the birthmark on her body. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)得知道英决定要与收购WID集团时装的负责人见面时，武烈便紧张起来，事实是武烈暗中想独吞。他怕东窗事发，便用海珠给的WID集团股份做为抵押向末年借了一大笔钱堵住代表方的嘴。同时，尹雪和道治发现Kelly竟是小春，尹雪也看到她身上的胎记。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 30
programme.desc: Yunxue took Kelly's toothbrush and did a DNA test and the result reveals a genetic relationship. On the other hand, Kelly's mother Shunmei demands the return of Kelly to her and informs them that Kelly is her adopted daughter. Kelly and Yunxue did a DNA test again but the result is negative. Yunxue is confused but nary did they know that the toothbrush belongs to Maya. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪拿Kelly的牙刷做亲子鉴定，报告证明Kelly就是尹雪的亲生女儿，尹雪非常高兴。Kelly母亲坚称小春是从正规机构认养的女儿。尹雪再次拿了小春和自己的头发做亲子鉴定，结果却显示尹雪与Kelly不是亲子关系，尹雪困惑了，而她们不知道那是玛亚的牙刷。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 1
programme.desc: This episode, Pornsak & Cui Fang are in Japan, Taiwan & Malaysia respectively to explore the development of instant noodles, the secret behind the taste of pineapples and tasting of pineapple tarts, search for the century-old handmade vermicelli and learn about cultivation and processing of durians. (首播)在第一集的《食材地图》节目中，Pornsak和林翠芳分别前往日本、台湾和马来西亚，一探快熟面的发展，发掘凤梨的美味奥秘，品尝台湾凤梨酥的酸甜滋味，寻找传承百年的手工米粉，了解万果之王榴梿的种植与加工。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 27
programme.desc: Priestess A'si gets ready to summon the dragon that will enable Dacheng to become the King. She orders Bajie to steal Devil King's energy for her. She transfers the energy onto a corpse and enables the corpse to return to life as a fearless zombie. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)阿斯女准备召唤龙，让大成顺利成王。阿斯女命令八戒帮她偷取魔王的真气，然后将那真气转移到一具尸体身上，让他成为凶猛的活死人。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) After an incident on their opening day, the trio became dejected and impolite to their own customers. Meiwei could not take it lying down and gave them a good talking to. When she left in a huff, the trio thought that she was giving up on them and tried all means to make her stay. (PG)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) The Ganges River assumes many past and present lives. The Hindus believe that the river is flown out of Shiva's hair and it's a sacred place which can wash away sins, cleanse souls and redeem for rebirth. Life is full of sins and atonement and Indians have their own views on life and death. (PG)(重)印度恒河承载着人们的前世今生。兴都徒相信恒河是由湿婆的头发流出来的，它可洗去身上所有罪孽，视之为洗涤灵魂不洁的净身圣地，给思维轮回带来救赎。人生罪恶苦难当，一生一世赎罪忙。印度人的生死观自有一番见解。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 75
programme.desc: (R) Jia-en attempts to silence Yinghao, but leaves the hospital hurriedly when Yinghao suddenly opens his eyes. Zaiyong tells Xiantai that he was brought to the orphanage by Shuzi. Xiantai is devastated upon learning the truth. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩到医院想将英镐灭口，英镐却突然睁开眼睛，吓得佳恩仓惶而逃。载永告诉贤泰当初是淑子把他带到育幼院的。贤泰知道真相后，痛苦万分。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Fengshun, her brother Fengqi, her best friend Jingxin, and Minhe go to the nightclub. The drunken Fengshun decides to pole dance but when she accidentally dislodged the pole. This scene was recorded and posted on the Internet. Fengshun became red-hot on social media. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉顺,弟弟奉奇和闺蜜京心，以及敏赫一起去夜店。喝醉的奉顺跑去跳钢管舞，结果把人家的钢管摇了下来，这一幕被录了下来，还传到了网上，奉顺在一夜之间就成了网红。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 31
programme.desc: Zhiyuan asks Haizhu to bring Maya to have her mole removed, but Maya refuses to go. Haizhu questions Zhiyuan why she adopted Maya to replace her deceased daughter, yet the latter refuses to explain. Meantime, Wulie files for a divorce with Haizhu as he believes he has wrestled away WID Group. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛要点海珠带玛亚去掉腰身上的黑痣，但玛亚不愿意。海珠问智媛为何从外面领养玛亚回来代替死去的女儿，智媛默默无言。同时，武烈以为已经夺取WID集团，便向海珠提出离婚。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 32
programme.desc: During the board meeting, Wulie votes that Daoying should be removed from the CEO position. At the same time, Wulie, who is charged for manipulating the share market, runs away. Yunxue wants a breakup with Daozi and reveals she is out to take revenge on Zhiyuan. Yunxue found Maya abandoned by Zhiyuan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)在股东大会里，武烈举双手赞成解雇道英为会长，此时金管会的人来调查武烈，武烈趁机逃走。尹雪要和道治分手，还告诉道治她接近他是为了向智媛报仇。尹雪看到玛亚被智媛赶出家，便把她带回自己的家。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 4
programme.desc: The remote river islands along India's Brahmaputra River in Assam are home to millions - yet basic healthcare is limited. Jojo Goh hops onto the boat clinics to deliver medical care, and to understand how lives are lost as islanders battle yearly flooding and extreme soil erosion, when typhoon strikes. 主持人吴俐璇首次乘船出诊，将医疗服务送到印度阿萨姆邦一条大河上的村庄里。大河将村民隔绝在现代医疗之外，唯有医疗船，能把疫苗接种和紧急接生等服务带给孤立无援的人。雨季大河年年洪涝，医疗船该怎么救死扶伤？.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 28
programme.desc: Priestess A'si will be summoning a black dragon. The Devil King says that the black dragon is especially powerful and suggests that Sanzang allows her body to be taken over by the black dragon to enable Wukong to eliminate it with the Heavenly Sword. Wukong does not approve of the suggestion. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)悟空查到即将被阿斯女召唤的龙是恶毒的黑龙。魔王说黑龙非常强大，就连悟空都可能没办法制服它。魔王建议将三藏的身体当成容器让黑龙附上去，然后由悟空用天剑将黑龙和三藏一起消灭。悟空不答应。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The coveted dream of being a K-pop star has prompted many young hopefuls to leave home for Korea in pursuit of their big break. Beyond the fame and glamour, what sacrifices do they have to make to keep this dream alive? (重)从素人到站上万众瞩目的舞台，韩国的流行神话，促使世界各地许多怀抱明星梦的年轻人，离家出走到韩国，等待一个华丽的转身。为了筑梦，他们付出了多少代价？在光鲜亮丽的外表底下，到底蕴藏了多少汗水、酸楚和无奈呢？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The topic of this episode is Chinese shaobing, pizza and biscuits from the west. Guo Liang, A Xian and Pornsak discuss about the history and making of different shaobing and pancakes in various regions in China, famous pizza in Italy, French crepes, popiah and pancakes in Singapore and Malaysia.
